backend/main.mo: Defines core e‑commerce types and shared state maps plus authorization helpers and user profile APIs inside a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to involved files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of various frontend pages, components, and utilities for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and mounting the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the React router with all public, onboarding, customer, vendor, and admin routes using AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper rendering top nav, bottom nav, children, and the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with navigation options for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with status feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to complete their profile details.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Guards content based on user role, showing access denied or loading states as needed.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with icons, active state styling, and a cart item count badge.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: Wrapper around Button applying primary CTA gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: A rotating banner slider with automatic cycling and manual navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Displays a grid of products with images, pricing, wishlist/cart actions, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Badge component displaying styled order status text.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with search, cart count, links, and authentication-aware actions.
frontend/src/data/vendors.ts: Static list of vendor records with basic shop and contact info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state and exposes login, clear, and identity access helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, products, and related data via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theming variables, dark mode palettes, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details and feature highlight cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing analytics metrics and a bar chart of products, orders, and vendors.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders for admins with status controls and triggers updates via API mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and deleting products with a modal form and API mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Provides vendor management for admins, allowing adding and removing vendors through dialogs and actor calls.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, handles quantity updates and removal, and manages checkout navigation with identity checks.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays product categories with loading skeletons and card-based navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Displays products from a selected category with sorting options and a product grid.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Builds an order summary from cart items and handles placing orders and clearing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation and preset contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Shows and edits the logged‑in customer's profile using form inputs and save mutations.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Lists the customer's past orders with status badges and basic order details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Displays products saved to the customer's wishlist by filtering all products against wishlist IDs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page offering navigation to customer or vendor login via interactive cards.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerLo: Collects customer onboarding details with validation and stores them before navigating to the vendor list.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/OutletDeta: Form page for entering outlet details, uploading an image, validating inputs, and saving data before navigating to the vendor dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SimpleVend: Displays a simple vendor dashboard showing registration success and outlet info using stored onboarding data.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorList: Lists vendors filtered by city and allows navigation to individual vendor shops, with empty states for missing or empty results.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorLogi: Vendor login form that validates personal and location details, saves them, and navigates to the outlet details step.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorShop: Shows details for a selected vendor from static vendor data, with navigation back to the vendor list.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Shows product details, image carousel, reviews, and supports adding to cart, wishlist, and submitting reviews.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Main vendor dashboard showing product count, orders, revenue, and quick navigation actions using product and order queries.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Displays vendor orders using a fetch hook, showing loading, empty state, or a list with status, date, customer, items, and total.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Provides UI for vendors to list, add, edit, and delete products with dialogs, form handling, and category selection.
frontend/src/utils/categoryMatch.ts: Offers a case‑insensitive search helper to find a category by name.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, and clearing customer, vendor, and outlet onboarding data in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Maps order and UI statuses to CSS class names and text labels, including stock availability helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, versioning, and the current high‑level app architecture.
